page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: Every year our school has a camp at which we all take part in sailing. We have l7 boats altogether, we also have l5 two-man tents which we use every year. Our Headmaster is a brilliant sailor. We usually go on sailing camp in June because that gives us time to save up our money. It cost us Â£l2 including all of our dinners. This year about forty children went so we had to hire a few tents. We have a test every year which includes capsize drill. There is a bar at the Club so at night we can buy drinks and crisps.There are also a few windsurfers. We have one swing and a sandpit. We have two old lorry innertubes and we have races on them. I shared a tent with my best friend Claire. We go in groups depending on what certificates we are doing. I got my R.Y.A. Junior Two Certificate.
